title: WCAS PSYCH 460-0-20 Special Topics in Cognition

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The focus of this course is an overview of research and theory related to children's cognitive development with a primary focus on infancy and childhood. Among the topics we will cover are: processes of conceptual change, abstract concepts, linguistic structure, social and moral cognition. Through discussion and readings on these topics we will gain information critical to understanding cognition in general.

subject: PSYCH
